Detailed Description

Constructs a new texture object with the given image.

void addAnimationTrack ( AnimationTrack *  animation_track  )  [virtual]

Adds the given AnimationTrack to this Object3D, potentially changing the order and indices of the previously added tracks.

void render ( RenderState &  state  )  const [virtual]

Render this object, for inner use.

Note: Texture2D should be rendered only at second rendering pass(pass=2). In other cases, do nothing.

Reimplemented from Transformable.

Member Data Documentation

const int FILTER_BASE_LEVEL = 208 [static]

A level filtering paramteer to setFiltering that selects the base lvevel image.

const int FILTER_LINEAR = 209 [static]

A parameter to setFiltering htat selects linear filtering.

const int FILTER_NEAREST = 210 [static]

A parameter to setFiltering that selects nearest neightbor filtering.

const int FUNC_ADD = 224 [static]

A paramter to setBlending, specifying that the texel color is to be added to the fragment.

const int FUNC_BLEND = 225 [static]

A paramter to setBlending, specifying that the texture blend color is to be blended into the fragment color in proportion to the texel RGB values.

const int FUNC_DECAL = 226 [static]

A parameter to setBlending, specifying that the texel color is to be blended into the fragment color in proportion to the texel alpha.

const int FUNC_MODULATE = 227 [static]

A parameter to setBlending , specifying that the texel color and/or alpha are to be multiplied with the fragment color and alpha.

const int FUNC_REPLACE = 228 [static]

A parameter to setBlending, specifying that the texle color and/or alpha are to replace the fragment color and alpha.

const int WRAP_CLAMP = 240 [static]

A parameter to setWrapping, specifying that the texture image i sto be repeated oly once.

const int WRAP_REPEAT = 241 [static]

A parameter to setWrappping, specifying that the texture image is tto be repeated indefinitely.
